description: Maldives breeze and sun-soaked vibes - a soundtrack for barefoot walks, lagoon swims, and sunsets.

items.name: Hulhumale Beach - The Most Popular Of All
Bikini Beach - To Flaunt That Bod
items.description: Situated on Rasdhoo Island, this is officially Maldives's bikini beach where you can flaunt your beach body without any worries. The beach not only offers breathtaking views, but is also huge in size. Leafy palm trees and comfy sun beds environs the beach quite well. So cuddle up with your love, soak up some sun and enjoy your romantic getaway at one of the most private beaches of Maldives!

items.name: Veligandu Island Beaches - Peaceful Vibes
Reethi Beach - An Epitome Of Luxury
items.description: Located on a tiny island in the Baa Atoll, Reethi Beach is an epitome of luxury and the most beautiful beach in Maldives. The white sands, sparkling water, and the beautiful palm trees make it the best beach in Maldives for honeymoon. With idyllic water villas to numerous fancy restaurants, Reethi Beach surely possesses the power of adding world-class comfort to your holiday. If you want to visit Maldives beaches at night, then this is the place to be owing to the lit nightlife here.

items.name: Cocoa Island Beaches - An Exotic Experience
Vabbinfaru Island Beaches - Engage In Jet Skiing
Nika Island Beaches - For A Laid Back Vacay
Fulhadhoo Beach - Away From The Bustle
Lily Beach - The Private Beach
Baros Maldives - Home To Tranquility
Bandos Maldives- A Perfect Tropical Escape
Taj Exotica Beach - Jewel Of South Male
Kandolhu Island Beach - The Beach With Emerald Water
Mirihi Island Beach - That Lavish Resort
items.description: Palm trees, white sand, emerald water, and comfortable seabeds, this beach has got everything you need to satisfy the nature admirer in you. Located on a small private island in South Ari Atoll, the beach is set amidst luxurious resorts that will surely sweep you off your feet the moment you step here.

items.name: Four Seasons Beach - Most Charming Spot
Kurumba Beach - The Honeymoon Getaway
Sun Island Beaches - For The Tropical Flowers
Fihalhohi Island Beach - In Between The House Reef
Bioluminescent Beaches - Glow In The Dark Sand
Dhigurah Beach - Dive With Whale Sharks
Artificial Beach – Manmade Heaven
Rasfannu – Oozing Of Opulence
Bodu Mora – For Coconut Trees
Kunburudhoo Beach – An Isolated Gem
Milaidhoo Island Maldives
items.description: Among all the Maldives best beaches this one is considered as the most popular one. People who are inclined to enjoying luxury in a natural environment, then this Island will be the best option to visit. Surrounded by powdery white sands beside a coral reef, this Island is perfect for the guests who are going to experience an indulgent escape from their daily mundane work life.

items.name: Kanuhura
items.description: This Island is located at the lovely Lhaviyani Atoll with a fabulous range of facilities combining perfect arrangements in the beach and classy dining. Visitors would love to come to this place with their family and friends because of its good arrangements. This Island is also suitable for solo travellers who love to explore new places and have the thirst for wandering and seeking the beauty of beaches.

items.name: Angsana Ihuru
items.description: This place is an eco-friendly luxury resort situated on the Island with the famous house reef in the Maldives. There is one best house reef located in the Maldives, located a few meters away from the beach. The arrangements for spectacular snorkeling and the excellent diving arrangements insist people to explore the underwater wonders. Apart from this drinks and delicious food are served in the restaurant situated in the beach and excellent Thai spa sessions are offered to the guests visiting there.
